thread.title: Maye Hunta Begins Naija Blood Project with New Single
thread.title_full: Maye Hunta Begins Naija Blood Project with New Single

author: Secure Nigeria 365
title: Maye Hunta Begins Naija Blood Project with New Single
text:
tweet 
A movement tagged “Naija Blood” which is conceptualized to celebrate the roots and successes of the Nigerian people on a global scale has been put together by Maye Hunta. According to the crooner, Naija Blood theme is a movement of a peculiar people with the Midas touch. The theme song of the movement “Naija Blood”as originally written and composed by Maye Hunta is a classic with an extremely infectious hook effortlessly delivered by Hunta. 
The Giggz produced song features Sinzu in vintage mode, Kelly Hansome spitting bars in Igbo, Morel representing the North, H-town next rated Bils holding it down in Yoruba for the Westside and of course the veteran eLDee the Don coming out of retirement for a minute to rap it up. 
Come 30th of October . Naija Blood’s very own undefeated prize fight boxing champ, Larry (The Natural) Ekundayo will be defending his ABU welterweight title in the UK on his journey to conquer the world. 
The Movement starts now; you can visit www.larrythenatural.com for further details. Follow the movement on twitter and Instagram: @naija_blood _
